birth_place.zh-cn: 奉天省金州四十里堡村

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国中将，满族。曾任东北军军官，后加入中国共产党，参与抗日战争和第二次国共内战。中华人民共和国成立后，曾任特种兵司令员、国防科学技术委员会副主任等职。因在庐山会议支持彭德怀而遭撤职，文革期间受迫害，后平反。
description.en: A founding lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) of Manchu ethnicity. He served as an officer in the Northeastern Army before joining the Communist Party of China, participating in the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War. After the founding of the People's Republic of China, he held positions such as Commander of the Special Forces and Deputy Director of the National Defense Science and Technology Commission. He was dismissed from his posts for supporting Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference and was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution, later being rehabilitated.

description.zh-cn: 万毅的配偶。
description.en: Spouse of Wan Yi.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期东北地区的军事学校，万毅于1930年毕业于此。
description.en: A military academy in Northeast China during the Republic of China era, from which Wan Yi graduated in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，东北军的领导者。万毅曾是其部下和副官。
description.en: A Marshal of the Republic of China and the leader of the Northeastern Army. Wan Yi served as his subordinate and aide-de-camp.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党派往东北军进行统战工作的人员，影响了万毅并介绍其入党。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party sent to the Northeastern Army for united front work, who influenced Wan Yi and introduced him to the party.

description.zh-cn: 东北军将领，曾怀疑并关押万毅。后与日军达成密约，万毅发动“九二二锄奸”时逃脱。
description.en: A general in the Northeastern Army who suspected and imprisoned Wan Yi. He later made a secret pact with the Japanese army and escaped when Wan Yi launched the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，与谷牧一同考察并介绍万毅入党。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party who, along with Gu Mu, vetted and introduced Wan Yi to the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，与张文海一同考察并介绍万毅入党。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party who, along with Zhang Wenhai, vetted and introduced Wan Yi to the party.

description.zh-cn: 东北军111师师长，与万毅一同发动“九二二锄奸”，后率部投奔共产党。
description.en: Commander of the 111th Division of the Northeastern Army, who launched the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' incident with Wan Yi and later led his troops to defect to the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 东北军57军副军长，因参与同日军讲和而被万毅在“九二二锄奸”中扣押。
description.en: Deputy commander of the 57th Army of the Northeastern Army, who was detained by Wan Yi during the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' incident for his involvement in peace talks with the Japanese.

description.zh-cn: 1940年9月22日，由万毅和常恩多发动的针对东北军内部投降派的清除行动。
description.en: An operation launched by Wan Yi and Chang Enduo on September 22, 1940, to purge the capitulationist faction within the Northeastern Army.

description.zh-cn: 东北军111师331旅旅长，于1941年逮捕了万毅。
description.en: Commander of the 331st Brigade of the 111th Division of the Northeastern Army, who arrested Wan Yi in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事和政治领导人，曾密令处决万毅。
description.en: Military and political leader of the Republic of China, who once secretly ordered the execution of Wan Yi.

en: Shandong Sub-bureau of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东的领导机构。万毅逃出监禁后在此找到党组织，并被任命改造旧军队。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Shandong. After escaping from imprisonment, Wan Yi found the party organization here and was appointed to reform the old army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾与常恩多共同发动东北军111师起义，后任万毅的副手。
description.en: A general of the PLA who, along with Chang Enduo, initiated the uprising of the 111th Division of the Northeastern Army and later served as Wan Yi's deputy.

en: 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会，万毅在此次会议上当选为候补中央委员。
description.en: The 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, where Wan Yi was elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一场关键战役，万毅率领第五纵队参战。
description.en: A decisive campaign during the Chinese Civil War, in which Wan Yi led the 5th Column to participate.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，其兵团在辽沈战役中被万毅所部阻击并最终被围歼。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, whose army group was blocked by Wan Yi's troops and eventually encircled and annihilated during the Liaoshen Campaign.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第四十二军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四十二军
en: 42nd Corps of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 由东北野战军第五纵队改编而成的中国人民解放军陆军军，万毅是其首任军长。
description.en: An army corps of the PLA Ground Force reorganized from the 5th Column of the Northeast Field Army, with Wan Yi as its first commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，万毅曾任其特种兵司令员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the PLA during the Chinese Civil War, where Wan Yi served as the commander of its special forces.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术委员会
en: National Defense Science and Technology Commission of the PLA

description.zh-cn: 负责中国国防科技工作的领导机构，万毅曾任其副主任。
description.en: The leading body responsible for China's national defense science and technology work, where Wan Yi served as deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在1959年庐山会议上因提出不同意见而受到批判，万毅因支持他而受到株连。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was criticized for expressing dissenting opinions at the 1959 Lushan Conference. Wan Yi was implicated for supporting him.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中共中央召开的一次重要会议，会上对彭德怀的批判导致了“反右倾”运动，万毅因支持彭德怀而被撤职。
description.en: An important meeting held by the CCP Central Committee in 1959, where the criticism of Peng Dehuai led to the 'Anti-Rightist' campaign. Wan Yi was dismissed from his posts for supporting Peng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，万毅在此期间受到迫害并被长期关押。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Wan Yi was persecuted and imprisoned for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 位于辽宁省大连市的市辖区，是万毅的出生地。
description.en: A municipal district of Dalian, Liaoning Province, and the birthplace of Wan Yi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，是万毅的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Wan Yi passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的军队之一，由张作霖、张学良父子统领。万毅早期在此服役。
description.en: One of the armies during the Republic of China era, led by Zhang Zuolin and his son Zhang Xueliang. Wan Yi served in this army in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，万毅于1938年加入。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which Wan Yi joined in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的主要武装力量之一，万毅在1942年率部投奔后加入。
description.en: One of the main armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which Wan Yi joined after leading his troops to defect in 1942.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，万毅是其开国中将之一。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China, of which Wan Yi was one of the founding lieutenant generals.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年间设立的机构，用于安置年事已高的领导人。万毅曾是其委员。
description.en: An institution established by the Communist Party of China from 1982 to 1992 to accommodate elderly leaders. Wan Yi was a member.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争初期保卫中华民国首都南京的战役，万毅曾率团参战。
description.en: A battle to defend Nanjing, the capital of the Republic of China, during the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War, in which Wan Yi participated as a regimental commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾在东北1947年夏季战役中与万毅共同指挥第一纵队。
description.en: A general of the PLA who co-commanded the 1st Column with Wan Yi during the 1947 Summer Offensive in Northeast China.

en: 5th Column of the Northeast Field Army

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军下属部队，万毅任司令员，后改编为第四十二军。
description.en: A unit under the Northeast Field Army commanded by Wan Yi, which was later reorganized into the 42nd Corps.

description.zh-cn: 万毅在第三、第四方面军任张学良的副官，后又在南京任其临时副官。
description.en: Wan Yi served as Zhang Xueliang's aide-de-camp in the 3rd and 4th Army Groups, and later as his temporary aide-de-camp in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 刘澜波在东北军进行统战工作时结识万毅，使其开始同情中共革命主张。
description.en: Liu Lanbo met Wan Yi during his united front work in the Northeastern Army, which made Wan Yi sympathetic to the CCP's revolutionary cause.

description.zh-cn: 缪澄流因怀疑万毅是共产党员而将其关押。
description.en: Miao Chengliu imprisoned Wan Yi on suspicion of being a Communist Party member.

description.zh-cn: 因缪澄流与日军达成密约，万毅发动“九二二锄奸”行动，试图将其扣押，但缪澄流逃脱。
description.en: Because Miao Chengliu made a secret pact with the Japanese army, Wan Yi launched the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' operation to detain him, but Miao escaped.

description.zh-cn: 经刘澜波介绍，与谷牧一起介绍万毅加入中国共产党。
description.en: After being introduced by Liu Lanbo, he and Gu Mu introduced Wan Yi to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 经刘澜波介绍，与张文海一起介绍万毅加入中国共产党。
description.en: After being introduced by Liu Lanbo, he and Zhang Wenhai introduced Wan Yi to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 与常恩多共同发动“九二二锄奸”行动。
description.en: Co-launched the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' operation with Chang Enduo.

description.zh-cn: 在“九二二锄奸”行动中扣押了朴炳珊。
description.en: Detained Piao Bingshan during the 'September 22nd Elimination of Traitors' operation.

description.zh-cn: 逮捕并将万毅关在鲁苏战区监狱。
description.en: Arrested Wan Yi and imprisoned him in the Lu-Su War Zone prison.

description.zh-cn: 在万毅被关押期间，密令将其处决。
description.en: While Wan Yi was imprisoned, he secretly ordered his execution.

description.zh-cn: 派遣万毅去领导和改造投奔共产党的东北军111师。
description.en: Dispatched Wan Yi to lead and reform the Northeastern Army's 111th Division, which had defected to the Communists.

description.zh-cn: 在东北军111师改编后，郭维城在代理师长万毅手下任副师长。
description.en: After the reorganization of the Northeastern Army's 111th Division, Guo Weicheng served as deputy division commander under acting commander Wan Yi.

description.zh-cn: 万毅在中共七大上当选为候补中央委员。
description.en: Wan Yi was elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee at the 7th National Congress of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 率领东北野战军第五纵队参加辽沈战役。
description.en: Led the 5th Column of the Northeast Field Army to participate in the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在辽沈战役中，万毅率领的第五纵队在彰武地区成功阻击了廖耀湘兵团。
description.en: During the Liaoshen Campaign, the 5th Column led by Wan Yi successfully blocked Liao Yaoxiang's army group in the Zhangwu area.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第四十二军

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军第五纵队改编为中国人民解放军第四十二军。
description.en: The 5th Column of the Northeast Field Army was reorganized into the 42nd Corps of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术委员会

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上发言支持彭德怀的意见书。
description.en: Spoke in support of Peng Dehuai's letter of opinion at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 因在庐山会议期间支持彭德怀而受到株连，被撤销了几乎所有职务。
description.en: Was implicated for supporting Peng Dehuai during the Lushan Conference and was dismissed from almost all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀在庐山会议上因上书陈述意见而受到严厉批判和撤职。
description.en: Peng Dehuai was severely criticized and dismissed from his post for submitting a letter expressing his opinions at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中受到迫害，被关押六年。
description.en: Was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and imprisoned for six years.

description.zh-cn: 率领其团参加南京保卫战，但全团战没。
description.en: Led his regiment to participate in the Battle of Nanjing, but the entire regiment was wiped out.

description.zh-cn: 在东北1947年夏季战役中，与司令员李天佑共同指挥第一纵队。
description.en: During the 1947 Summer Offensive in Northeast China, he co-commanded the 1st Column with commander Li Tianyou.
